control.description-key: Fluent UI v9 MessageBar Component for Canvas Apps

property.name: Message
property.description-key: The message text to display in the message bar

property.name: Title
property.description-key: Optional title displayed above the message

property.name: Dismissible
property.description-key: Whether the message bar can be dismissed by the user

property.name: ActionText
property.description-key: Optional text for an action button

property.name: IsDismissed
property.description-key: Triggers when the message bar is dismissed (toggles true/false)

property.name: ActionClicked
property.description-key: Triggers when the action button is clicked (toggles true/false)
